creditline: Gift of Ellen and Sheldon Sturgis
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two panel huipil; white ground cloth with discontinuous and continuous supplementary weft patterning; upper half is solid multi-color patterning, zig zags, chevrons, weft face stripes; lower half is decorated more sparsely with rows of dashes, and random design elements interspersed with sold rows of patterning.
title: Woman's wedding blouse (Huipil)
